message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for sale. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on a truly valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to me, and I'm confident you'll find it's a worthwhile investment.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $10500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value I place on the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not sure if $10500 is within my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $11000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I place on the product.

I'm still not convinced that $11000 is the right price for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, but I can only go up to $10500. I think this is a fair price considering the value I think the product has to me.
